text.div:
BC PortionTotalityCS CodeSystem

Further detail of the anatomical location or specimen detailing whether it includes the entire entity or only a part or portion.

name: PortionTotalityCS
title: BC PortionTotalityCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Further detail of the anatomical location or specimen detailing whether it includes the entire entity or only a part or portion.

concept.definition: ALL Being or representing the total number of individual entities.
concept.display: ALL Being or representing the total number of individual entities.

concept.definition: ENTIRE Whole Being or representing the complete extent of a single entity.
concept.display: ENTIRE Whole Being or representing the complete extent of a single entity.

concept.definition: PARTIAL Being or representing an incomplete extent of a single entity.
concept.display: PARTIAL Being or representing an incomplete extent of a single entity.

concept.definition: SEGMENT One of the parts into which something is divided.
concept.display: SEGMENT One of the parts into which something is divided.
